minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Let's discuss the ai insurance poc development and where we stand.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your API integration is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Actually, let me clarify... our latency is showing 90% accuracy, and the CAC is improving.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for SaaS metrics.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Well, I think... our accuracy is showing 92% accuracy, and the TAM is improving.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your runway metrics.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the API integration issues and expect MRR to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your API integration is solid first.
